data.title: Bitmine (BMNR) Drops 12.6% on Ethereum Fall
data.description: We recently published 10 Stocks Already Hurting in December. Bitmine Immersion Technologies, Inc. (NYSEAmerican:BMNR) is one of the top performers on Monday. Bitmine saw its share prices decline by 12.62 percent on Monday to close at $28.94 apiece as investor sentiment was dampened by Ethereum’s drop in prices on the same day. As of writing, Ethereum […]
data.keywords: Bitmine Immersion Technologies, Inc., share prices, Ethereum
